body.name: OMEDDERIC Roll Up Drying Rack Over Sink - Dish Rack Over Sink with Dishes Drying Rack Over The Sink, Stainless Steel Flat Rectangular Tube for Kitchen Sink and Counter Space Saving, 17" L x 13" W

features: At our store, we offer four different size options for **over-the-sink dish drying racks**: 13"(L) x 17"(W), 17"(L) x 17"(W), and 15"(L) x 20.5"(W). These sizes are suitable for most kitchen sinks and counters, making it easy to find the perfect fit for your space.

Kitchen organization is essential for maintaining a clean and functional kitchen. A **dish rack over sink** can help with this by providing a convenient place to air-dry dishes and utensils while freeing up counter space. Our **roll up dish drying rack** is designed to be compact and efficient, helping you keep your kitchen organized and tidy.

The 13"(L) x 17"(W) option is specifically designed for sinks that are less than 17 inches wide, making it a great choice for those with smaller kitchens or limited counter space. An **expandable dish drying rack in sink** is a smart investment for keeping your kitchen organized and your daily chores more efficient.

Please ensure that you check your sink measurements and select the appropriate size before purchasing an **over sink dish drying rack**. This is a fantastic addition to your kitchen accessories and a necessity for apartment living. These great kitchen gadgets will help keep your kitchen tidy and your home cozy.

High-quality stainless steel: Our **expandable dish drying rack over the sink** is made of durable 304 stainless steel, ensuring strength and rust resistance. Multi-purpose design: The drying rack can be used as a **dish drainer**, vegetable colander, trivet mat, sink caddy, sink cover, camping sink mat, fruit hammock, and more. Space-saving: The rollable design allows for easy storage and frees up valuable counter and sink space in the kitchen. Heat-resistant and food-safe: The dish draining rack is coated with food-safe grade TPE and can withstand temperatures up to 400°F, making it a versatile kitchen tool.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: **1. Space-Efficient Dish Drying Rack for Kitchen Counters** **DISH DRYING RACK OVER THE SINK** Our specially designed **FOLDABLE DRYING RACK FOR KITCHEN SINKS** is engineered for efficient space utilization in the kitchen. Made from sturdy 304 stainless steel rectangular tubing, it ensures durability and strength. This collapsible sink drying rack is both slip-resistant and waterproof, capable of supporting up to 35 pounds without bending or twisting, even when holding heavy cookware. - **SPACE SAVING** - The **ROLL UP DISH DRYING RACK** can be easily rolled up and stored in a cabinet when not in use, freeing up valuable counter and sink space. It's a perfect addition for essential apartment living and home accessories.

**2. Multi-Functional Kitchen Sink Tool** - **MULTI-PURPOSE** - The **DISH RACK FOR THE SINK** Is an incredibly versatile tool in the kitchen, serving multiple functions. The **ROLL UP DISH DRYING RACK** can be used as an air-dryer for various kitchenware such as bowls, pans, glasses, cups, plates, cutlery, saucepans, and mugs. Additionally, it can also double as a vegetable colander for washing fruits and vegetables or as a non-slip trivet mat for hot pots or bakeware on countertops.

**3. Compact and Efficient Kitchen Organizer** - **COMPACT & EFFICIENT** - He **Dish Drying Racks For Kitchen Counter** come in two size options, specifically designed for sinks with a width of less than 17 inches, maximizing space around the sink. They are constructed from durable 304 stainless steel rectangular tubes, making them an excellent choice for those who value functionality and longevity.

**4. Easy to Clean and Use Sink Drying Rack** - **EASY CLEANING & USAGE** - The **Expandable Dish Drying Rack In Sink** features 14-18 high-quality stainless steel rectangular tubes firmly fixed with TPE for easy cleaning and usage. When not in use, the kitchen dish drying rack can be effortlessly rolled up and stored in a cabinet, liberating your kitchen counter and sink space.

Food Safe and Heat Resistant - **FOOD SAFE & HEAT RESISTANT** - The **over sink dish drying rack** is coated with food-grade silicone and heat-resistant up to 400°F (204°C), making it BPA-free, dishwasher safe, and perfect for use as a trivet for cooling down hot pans from the oven or stovetop or thawing frozen items from the refrigerator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how the metal pieces are flat and not round. It helps me when drying things. While the water doesn't roll off the same way, this is easier to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars O problems works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and clean. Perfect size for our sink!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a camper
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our RV and it works great over the sink as a drying rack. The rubber on each end helps to grip the sink surround so it doesn't slip. Rolls up for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars sturdy and practical to have.
reviews.reviewText: This drying rack is what I need for my house. I need a place for small amount of dis to air dry. It is sturdy but my only complaint is that gap between the rack is too big that when you're trying to dry some silverwares, they actually go through the gap. But overall, I will recommend it to anybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Maximize your sink space **Bachelor Hacks**
reviews.reviewText: OMEDDERIC’s roll up, over the sink disk rack is a solid execution of a pretty basic idea. More or less a miniature roll up ladder, laid on its side and positioned over your sink. The hollow slats make the rack super like and the silicon sides grip counters well.More often than not I leave mine in place folded in half; I roll it all the way occasionally (still leaving it in place at the edge of the sink) and, of course, extend it fully for washing and drying dishes and fruit. It’s a simple item and pretty much as advertised on the product page, so I’ll forgo a detailed description of slats and silicon strips.This enables my bachelor habits; use – rinse – air dry the same 4 implements until company compels me to do otherwise.All that said, value-wise – I balk at the price a little. I definitely like it, but not sure I’d shell out full price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GOT A PROBLEM WITH COUNTER SPACE....BUY THIS! MY WIFE IS SO HAPPY I GOT THIS!!
reviews.reviewText: At first when I got this item, my wife was skeptical about its use. However, after having this for a while now, she absolutely LOVES IT!! The flatness of the tubes used are perfect for setting a flat glass or cup on. The round tubes only give you a small spot and glasses and cups can tip over. This one works great.Just measure your sink area and purchase the one that best fits your area. Roll it on and enjoy. When you need to use the sink underneath, just roll it to the side. DYNAMITE!Try it, if you don't like it, return it....Amazon policy for returned items is terrific! Buy with confidence!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy for small kitchens when you need some extra space for drying
reviews.reviewText: I got the 17X17 version. Sometimes I need extra space for drying dishes when I've been putting off doing them and my dish rack can't handle the backup. I use it on top of my wash basin. What I like about it:- Seems decent quality. Very lightweight. The bars are square so that probably adds some rigidity strength to them.- Rolls up very nicely. I use a random rubberband that came with some brocolli to tie it up. I don't really need it but it's nice to keep it from unraveling when I move it around. Could imagine it coming in really handy in an RV or while camping.- I'm glad that the material at the edges that holds the whole thing together is silicone so it doesn't have any rough edges.Seems a bit pricy but is a lot more reasonable with the current coupon code that basically gives you 33% off.
